text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/65c4415276394c871c7a8711c7633c19ec9235b1|patch 8.2.2204: Vim9: using -> both for method and lambda is confusing>
patch 8.2.2204: Vim9: using -> both for method and lambda is confusing

Problem:    Vim9: using -> both for method and lambda is confusing.
Solution:   Use => for lambda in :def function.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2204: Vim9: using -> both for method and lambda is confusing · vim/vim@65c4415
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2204: Vim9: using -> both for method and lambda is confusing · vim/vim@65c4415
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: using -> both for method and lambda is confusing. Solution: Use => for lambda in :def function.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/b34f33747223d9cba4b32a27aee70c1705b36ed9|patch 8.2.2203: Moodle gift files are not recognized>
patch 8.2.2203: Moodle gift files are not recognized

Problem:    Moodle gift files are not recognized.
Solution:   Add a filetype pattern. (Delim Temizer)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2203: Moodle gift files are not recognized · vim/vim@b34f337
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2203: Moodle gift files are not recognized · vim/vim@b34f337
attachments.text: Problem: Moodle gift files are not recognized. Solution: Add a filetype pattern. (Delim Temizer)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/16204962c7ad7380a40f0855443303ad16114e2b|patch 8.2.2202: write file test still fails on MS-Windows>
patch 8.2.2202: write file test still fails on MS-Windows

Problem:    Write file test still fails on MS-Windows.
Solution:   Set fileformat with the :edit command

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2202: write file test still fails on MS-Windows · vim/vim@1620496
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2202: write file test still fails on MS-Windows · vim/vim@1620496
attachments.text: Problem: Write file test still fails on MS-Windows. Solution: Set fileformat with the :edit command

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/bd318559cf8dea210e943100536011473f25bf68|patch 8.2.2201: write file test fails on MS-Windows>
patch 8.2.2201: write file test fails on MS-Windows

Problem:    Write file test fails on MS-Windows.
Solution:   Force edit after setting 'fileformat'.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2201: write file test fails on MS-Windows · vim/vim@bd31855
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2201: write file test fails on MS-Windows · vim/vim@bd31855
attachments.text: Problem: Write file test fails on MS-Windows. Solution: Force edit after setting 'fileformat'.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/27bf7af9d042b396c412fcad7bac59849a4a420f|patch 8.2.2200: Vim9: lambda without white space around -> is confusing>
patch 8.2.2200: Vim9: lambda without white space around -> is confusing

Problem:    Vim9: lambda without white space around -> is confusing.
Solution:   Require white space in a :def funtion. (issue #7503)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2200: Vim9: lambda without white space around -> is confusing · vim/vim@27bf7af
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2200: Vim9: lambda without white space around -> is confusing · vim/vim@27bf7af
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: lambda without white space around -> is confusing. Solution: Require white space in a :def funtion. (issue #7503)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/b3c8b1d25414f2e24ad03551cdf125b3e2c142b1|patch 8.2.2199: first write after setting 'eol' does not have NL added>
patch 8.2.2199: first write after setting 'eol' does not have NL added

Problem:    First write after setting 'eol' does not have NL added. (Tomáš
            Janoušek)
Solution:   Only use b_no_eol_lnum when doing a binary write. (closes #7535)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2199: first write after setting 'eol' does not have NL added · vim/vim@b3c8b1d
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2199: first write after setting 'eol' does not have NL added · vim/vim@b3c8b1d
attachments.text: Problem: First write after setting 'eol' does not have NL added. (Tomáš Janoušek) Solution: Only use b_no_eol_lnum when doing a binary write. (closes #7535)
